review: Horrible, barely connects and the remote is trash.  Amazon wants you to download an apptocontrol your tv.  Annoyed that I need yet another app to function in life. I will try and return and get a roku.

review: very intuitive and easy to use.  simple operation.  been binge watching Downton Abbey.  glad I bought it.

review: Inexpensive and so convenient. Bought one for every tv in the house.
